Text:
Anyone who objects to Princess Rose
is a rebel! Fire!

Inside the ceremony hall, many nobles are in
attendance to celebrate the crowning of a new king.

The wedding of Perv and Rose is so far going
without a hitch.
She went of her own free will.
It is just a ceremony for her to abdicate to Perv.

Do you take Rose Oriana to be your wedded wife,
to have and to hold for better, for worse, for
richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health,
to love and to cherish her?

I killed the king, betrayed my kingdom, and swore
myself to a shadowy organization.
I have no excuses. I accept full blame.
But, I have one last thing I need to do.

You manipulated my father, the King of the Oriana
Kingdom, corrupted the queen, and plotted to
overthrow the kingdom.
What is the meaning of this?! Where is your proof?!
I don't need any, do I?

Enough with this foolishness! I've got a hostage,
remember?!
Say your vows like a good little girl! Then—
I have received it in return—

The instant Rose puts on the ring, it shines with
a bright light.

The light from the ring goes up through the roof of
the building, creating a pillar of light.

After a few moments the light dims, and an image is
projected into the air.
I, Geerk, fulfill my last duty.
Tell this to all of the people of Oriana.

By the time you hear this confession, I may have
already passed from this world.

Day after day, I can feel my mind wither away.
It won't be long before I lose myself entirely...
But, before that happens, I must tell you the truth.

My decline is being caused by some sort of drug.
I don't know how. I ask my wife to secretly swap
out my meals, but to no effect.
There...there is nothing more I can do.

He's being backed by a powerful organization,
and they're trying to seize control of the Oriana
Kingdom. I'm sure many must have found it odd.

How could Perv, the mere adopted son of the Asshat
family, have reached such a distinguished position
in Oriana in such a brief time?
Yes, he's probably not even from the capital...
This is bad. The eyes of the people will be on us.
The grunts are going to run wild.

We had better start wagging our tails like the rest
of the riff-raff.

I plan on fighting to the bitter end to protect this
nation.
But even if I fail, there's nothing for you to fear.

The future of our kingdom is in the hands of the
person I trust the most,
I entrust that future to my daughter, Rose Oriana—

No matter what happens, I want you all to believe
in her. She will be the one to lead our nation to
greatness.
Rose, I entrust the future of this kingdom to you.
Who is going to believe this charade?!
Bring down the hammer of justice!
You suck me dry, and now—
As queen of the Oriana Kingdom,
As the person entrusted with this kingdom's future!
I, Rose Oriana, find you guilty!

Sh-Shut your trap...! Guards! Stop standing around!
Arrest her!
Hey, hasn't the wedding finished yet?

I thought he would be of a little more use, but
useless allies really are more trouble than one's
enemies.

A man with fiery red hair and a strange aura stands
in the ceremony hall. He is in a place that everyone
is paying attention to, but no one had payed him any
mind.
Don't you think so, new queen of Oriana?

There is no sign of his swordmanship. But at
a glance Rose can tell that the man is extremely
powerful.

Mordred, the Transcendent Knight and 9th member
of the Rounds.
